quote: The most important single ingredient in the formula of success is knowing how to get along with people. – Theodore Roosevelt
fact: If you went out into space, you would explode before you suffocated because there`s no air pressure.
joke: My sister bet me $15 that I couldn't build a car out of spaghetti. You should have seen the look on her face as I drove pasta.
